name: For Sale by Owner
description: This U.S.-focused Amazon FBA business sells private-label incense products and operates with approximately 35% net profit margins. Launched in 2021, it requires around 14 hours per week to manage inventory, reorders, and basic PPC, and is fully brand registered on Amazon. The business is owner-operated with no employees, leverages a long-term relationship with a single supplier in Vietnam, and includes brand assets and a WordPress site inventory is excluded from the asking price.
